channel.title: Need server side dark bow spec
channel.description:
need it please dont pose the following dark bow spec: ipwnjagex`s dark bow spec it got 1 error shitty after deleting it gives 7 then 10 then 13 then 100.
please post me a good SERVER SIDE dark bow tutorial! and you might get admin spot on zedexscape.
i use icerealm source BTW.

item.title: Need server side dark bow spec
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

My dark bow looks like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) { if(DDStimer == 0 && actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 1; DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; PkingDelay = 18; UseBow = true; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Need server side dark bow spec

item.title: Need server side dark bow spec
item.dc:creator: @Volrom Volrom
item.description:
@Volrom wrote:

ture,

just search “dark bow” 4 5 times, then just edit the statistics of the special attack to your liking. Heres the code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (15156))
if(actionTimer == 0) // dark bow
{
PkingDelay = 0;
actionTimer = 0;
hitDiff = 40 + misc.random(20);
}

Is that easy enough? If not, just post right back so I can get it done tonight.

-Volrom

Read full topic
item.source: Need server side dark bow spec

item.source: Need server side dark bow spec

item.title: Need server side dark bow spec
item.dc:creator: @Volrom Volrom
item.description:
@Volrom wrote:

Ture,

If you are using Ice Realm, it should have the same features as many other sources. If you just search in client.java for “dark bow”, you should get a bunch of code. Now take a good look at it, it contains the special attack functions. Now search it again for about 4 times, now just edit the pking delay, ect… I say, put the pk delay to 0 and the actionTimer to 0, but change the hitdiff to anything you want. Now just press save, compile and run your server, and you should be set to go! +Rep if this was useful! TY

-Volrom

Read full topic
